title: SoftwareCitation: Computable Publishing®: ClinicalTrials.gov-to-FEvIR Converter

summary.text: Computable Publishing®: ClinicalTrials.gov-to-FEvIR Converter [Executable app], version 4.9.1. Contributors:  Computable Publishing LLC [Author]. In: Fast Evidence Interoperability Resources (FEvIR) Platform. Published June 04, 2021. Revised October 09, 2023. Accessed November 25, 2023. Available at: https://fevir.net/ctgovconvert.

abstract.text:
Computable Publishing®: ClinicalTrials.gov-to-FEvIR Converter converts ClinicalTrials.gov JSON to FEvIR Resources in FHIR® JSON. 
• Enter an NCT Identifier (NCTID) and click Submit. 
• FHIR Resources will be created for all Protocol and Results Section Data in the ClinicalTrials.gov record. 
• For related articles listed in MEDLINE, the Computable Publishing®: ClinicalTrials.gov-to-FEvIR Converter automates use of the Computable Publishing®: MEDLINE-to-FEvIR Converter.

Create FHIR Resources with no technical expertise needed 
• Creates ResearchStudy, Citation, EvidenceVariable, Organization, Practitioner, PractitionerRole, Group, EvidenceReport, and Evidence Resources. 
• Creates all the links between Resources (reference to standalone or contained resources) 
• Create FEvIR Object Identifiers (FOIs) for all standalone Resources

Retains structure for all structured data 
• 100% of data elements in Protocol Section and Results Section are traceable to maintain knowledge representation

Computable Publishing®: ClinicalTrials.gov-to-FEvIR Converter is one of the many Converter tools on the FEvIR Platform. 
• Converter Tools transform data between known structured forms and the FHIR standard form. 
• The FEvIR Platform provides access to an array of tools which enable creating and viewing scientific knowledge in standard-based, machine-interpretable units called Resources.

description: This Citation Resource is referenced in an example for the EBMonFHIR Implementation Guide.
